titles.title: To reduce temporarily the rate of duty on certain machinery for molding unvulcanized rubber for tires.
To reduce temporarily the rate of duty on certain machinery for molding unvulcanized rubber for tires.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to temporarily suspend the duty on certain machinery for molding unvulcanized rubber for tires.
